LinAlg::Matrix< T, D > Class Template Reference

#include <LinAlg/Matrix.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename T, unsigned D>
class LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >

A linear algebra matrix class of fixed type and size.


Public Types

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T, unsigned D>
LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >::Matrix (  const std::vector< T > &  values  )  [inline]
 

Create a matrix from a std::vector of values.

The values are assigned in column-major order, that is, matrix(i,j) gets values[i + D * j].

See also:
convert()

template<typename T, unsigned D>
LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >::Matrix (  const Matrix< T, D > &  m  )  [inline]
 

Copy another matrix.

See also:
convert()

template<typename T, unsigned D>
template<typename Other>
Matrix< T, D > LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >::convert (  const std::vector< Other > &  values  )  [inline, static]
 

Create a matrix of this type from std::vector of a different type.

The values are assigned in column-major order, that is, matrix(i,j) gets values[i + D * j].

template<typename T, unsigned D>
void LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >::eigs (  Vector< T, D > &  values,
Matrix< T, D > &  vectors
)  const
 

Compute the eigenvalues and eigenvectors.

The eigenvectors are stored as the columns of vectors.

template<typename T, unsigned D>
T * LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >::getData (   )  [inline]
 

Direct read-write access to the underlying data.

The elements are stored densely in column-major order.

template<typename T, unsigned D>
const T * LinAlg::Matrix< T, D >::getData (   )  const [inline]
 

Direct read-only access to the underlying data.

The elements are stored densely in column-major order.
